verse.Jennie: Cheonsa gateun "hi" kkeuten angma gateun "bye" Maebeon michildeuthan high dwien baeteoya haneun price Igeon dabi eomneun test, maebeon sokdeorado yes Ttakan gamjeongui noye, eoreo jugeul saranghae
verse.Lisa: Here I come kickin' the door, uh Gajang dokan geollo jwo, uh Ppeonhadi ppeonhan geu love Deo naenwabwa give me some more Araseo maedallyeo byeorang kkeute Hanmadimyeon tto like hebeolle hae Geu ttatteuthan tteollimi saeppalgan seollemi Machi heaven gatgetjiman, you might not get in it

prechorus.Jisoo: Look at me, look at you Nuga deo apeulkka you smart (You smart) Nuga you are Du nune pinunmul heureuge doendamyeon so sorry (So sorry) Nuga you are
prechorus.Rose: Na eotteokae nayakan nal gyeondil su eopseo Aesseo du nuneul garin chae Sarangui sumtongeul kkeuneoyagesseo

chorus.Jennie: Prum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum
Prum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum

verse.Jennie: Feelin' like a sinner It's so fire with him I go boo-hoo
verse.Lisa: He said "You look crazy" Thank you, baby I owe it all to you
verse.Jennie: Got me all messed up His love is my favorite
verse.Lisa: But you plus me Sadly can be dangerous

prechorus.Jisoo: Lucky me, lucky you Gyeolgugen geojitmal we lie (We lie) So what? So what? Manyage naega neol jiuge Doendamyeon so sorry (So sorry) I'm not sorry
prechorus.Rose: Na eotteokae nayakan nal gyeondil su eopseo Aesseo nunmureul gamchun chae, eh Sarangui sumtongeul kkeuneoyagesseo

chorus.Jennie: Prum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum
Prum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum, pum

bridge.Rose: We all commit to love That makes you cry, oh-oh We're all making love That kills you inside, yeah

song.outro: We must kill this love (Yeah, yeah) Yeah, it's sad but true Gotta kill this love (Yeah, yeah) Before it kills you too Kill this love (Yeah, yeah) Yeah, it's sad but true Gotta kill this love (Yeah, yeah) Gotta kill, let's kill this love!
